changeSet.author: bouhoursant
changeSet.sql: UPDATE operationallimitsgroup SET current_limits_temporary_limits = NULL WHERE current_limits_temporary_limits = '[]'
UPDATE operationallimitsgroup SET apparent_power_limits_temporary_limits = NULL WHERE apparent_power_limits_temporary_limits = '[]'
UPDATE operationallimitsgroup SET active_power_limits_temporary_limits = NULL WHERE active_power_limits_temporary_limits = '[]'
UPDATE operationallimitsgroup SET current_limits_permanent_limit = NULL WHERE current_limits_permanent_limit = 'NaN'
UPDATE operationallimitsgroup SET apparent_power_limits_permanent_limit = NULL WHERE apparent_power_limits_permanent_limit = 'NaN'
UPDATE operationallimitsgroup SET active_power_limits_permanent_limit = NULL WHERE active_power_limits_permanent_limit = 'NaN'
